main event: A civilian observer reported sighting an unidentified flying object in Burlison, Texas on December 6, 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as bright, luminous, and spherical,The object changed colors from red to blue to white during the observation,The sighting lasted approximately 15 to 20 minutes,Another observation recorded an object tumbling and flashing over a duration of 30 minutes,The evaluated sightings were recorded under Project Blue Book.
